stories.Title: Changes in job roles
stories.Description: Google's AI advancements are now reaching its ad creation services. New tools, like Performance Max, leverage generative AI to automate certain tasks, reshaping roles and responsibilities.
stories.Tweet: Changes in job roles 📦 Google's AI advancements are now reaching its ad creation services. New tools, like Performance Max, leverage generative AI to automate certain tasks, reshaping roles and responsibilities. #google https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/12/report-google-ads-restructure-could-replace-some-sales-jobs-with-ai/

stories.Title: Powerful than ever
stories.Description: Anthropic, well known as the closest rival to OpenAI and notably supported by industry giants like Google and Salesforce, is currently in talks for a substantial $750 million funding round.
stories.Tweet: Powerful than ever 📦 Anthropic, well known as the closest rival to OpenAI and notably supported by industry giants like Google and Salesforce, is currently in talks for a substantial $750 million funding round. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/12/21/openai-rival-anthropic-in-talks-to-raise-750-million-funding-round.html

stories.Title: V6 has arrived
stories.Description: There's an exciting Christmas present waiting for you on Discord! Midjourney has just released version 6, which includes more realistic images and text generation functionality.
stories.Tweet: V6 has arrived 📦 There's an exciting Christmas present waiting for you on Discord! Midjourney has just released version 6, which includes more realistic images and text generation functionality. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/midjourney-v6-is-here-with-in-image-text-and-completely-overhauled-prompting/

stories.Title: To deep space and beyond
stories.Description: NASA is making progress toward its Moon and Mars vision, with the recent test of the Rotating Detonation Rocket Engine. A new propulsion system that promises to redefine deep-space missions.
stories.Tweet: To deep space and beyond 📦 NASA is making progress toward its Moon and Mars vision, with the recent test of the Rotating Detonation Rocket Engine. A new propulsion system that promises to redefine deep-space missions. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/nasa-rotating-detonation-rocket-engine-test-space-1851118842

stories.Title: Ingenuity does it again!
stories.Description: A new distance record has been set by Ingenuity. NASA's helicopter completed its 69th flight on Mars, highlighting its endurance and capabilities, leaving engineers in awe.
stories.Tweet: Ingenuity does it again!  📦 A new distance record has been set by Ingenuity. NASA's helicopter completed its 69th flight on Mars, highlighting its endurance and capabilities, leaving engineers in awe. #NASA https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-mars-helicopter-flies-colossal-distance/

stories.Title: A brief delay
stories.Description: Another company is changing its launch timeline due to weather conditions and SpaceX's tight agenda. Axiom Space's Ax-3 crewed mission is now slated for January 17th.
stories.Tweet: A brief delay 📦 Another company is changing its launch timeline due to weather conditions and SpaceX's tight agenda. Axiom Space's Ax-3 crewed mission is now slated for January 17th. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/spacex-ax-3-astronaut-mission-launch-delay-january-17

stories.Title: Toyota’s battery issues
stories.Description: Toyota faces a recall of over 25,000 units in China as the bZ3 EV encounters issues with its battery management controller, causing incorrect power estimates, and sudden power loss for users.
stories.Tweet: Toyota’s battery issues 📦 Toyota faces a recall of over 25,000 units in China as the bZ3 EV encounters issues with its battery management controller, causing incorrect power estimates, and sudden power loss for users. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/12/21/toyota-recalls-over-25000-bz3-evs-in-china-due-to-inaccurate-remaining-battery-estimates/

stories.Title: China welcomes Megafactory
stories.Description: Tesla expands its energy revolution with a new Megafactory project in China, mirroring the success of its California facility. This move also aims to cut logistical costs.
stories.Tweet: China welcomes Megafactory 📦 Tesla expands its energy revolution with a new Megafactory project in China, mirroring the success of its California facility. This move also aims to cut logistical costs. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/12/22/tesla-launches-project-build-new-megafactory-china/

stories.Title: Ain't no mountain high enough
stories.Description: Peak Evolution's solar electric truck has conquered the world's highest volcano, setting an unprecedented altitude record at 6,500 meters, proving the power of electric vehicles.
stories.Tweet: Ain't no mountain high enough 📦 Peak Evolution's solar electric truck has conquered the world's highest volcano, setting an unprecedented altitude record at 6,500 meters, proving the power of electric vehicles. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/12/20/solar-electric-truck-worlds-highest-volcano-new-record/

stories.Title: Vision Pro is really getting closer
stories.Description: As Apple gears up for the Vision Pro launch, presumably happening in February, developers are getting a "Get ready" email, prompting them to catch up with their visionOS apps.
stories.Tweet: Vision Pro is really getting closer 📦 As Apple gears up for the Vision Pro launch, presumably happening in February, developers are getting a "Get ready" email, prompting them to catch up with their visionOS apps. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/12/20/apple-reminds-devs-get-ready-for-vision-pro/

title: Google's ad evolution, Countdown to Vision Pro, Midjourney's gift
description: Looks like Google's really nailing the AI game across all its services. Things are getting so automated that certain job roles are shifting. We've heard whispers about Vision Pro dropping in February, but how sure can we be? Well, most developers working with visionOS got the memo from Apple to fine-tune their apps. And for the creative minds out there, Midjourney just dropped Version 6! Bringing even more realistic images and finally diving into text generation. What a cool present, huh? Wishing everyone a super Merry Christmas!
